top_stories.title: Meta sues AI ‘nudify’ app Crush AI for advertising on its platforms
top_stories.description: Meta has sued the maker of a popular AI "nudify" app, Crush AI, that reportedly ran thousands of ads across its platforms.
top_stories.author: Maxwell Zeff

top_stories.title: Multiverse Computing raises $215M for tech that could radically lower AI costs
top_stories.description: Spanish startup Multiverse Computing said it raised an enormous Series B round on the strength of a technology it calls “CompactifAI.”
top_stories.author: Julie Bort

top_stories.title: Can AI Truly Develop a Memory That Adapts Like Ours?
top_stories.description:
Exploring Titans: A new architecture equipping LLMs with human-inspired memory that learns and updates itself during test-time.
The post Can AI Truly Develop a Memory That Adapts Like Ours? appeared first on Towards Data Science.
top_stories.author: Moulik Gupta

top_stories.title: Robot-Gated Interactive Imitation Learning with Adaptive Intervention Mechanism
top_stories.description:
arXiv:2506.09176v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: Interactive Imitation Learning (IIL) allows agents to acquire desired behaviors through human interventions, but current methods impose high cognitive demands on human supervisors. We propose the Adaptive Intervention Mechanism (AIM), a novel robot-gated IIL algorithm that learns an adaptive criterion for requesting human demonstrations. AIM utilizes a proxy Q-function to mimic the human intervention rule and adjusts intervention requests based on
top_stories.author: Haoyuan Cai, Zhenghao Peng, Bolei Zhou
